pageContext.claim: “You know what the way I look at it, when fake news CNN, oops there goes the camera off. Red light just went off. Say I can tell everyone of them. I know them by heart. I know the operators, I know the cameraman they're OK. They're all on our side. By the way they screamed at, Get that camera off. I don't want to do that. Get that camera off. it's to be a job, all right, I'm sorry, President.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes falsely claims that he can see a camera light indicating that CNN is cutting away from his rally in real time.
